answers.answer: Haaaa that's a nice story I went to the doc an just told me am going to induce you today an she makes apt at 8 so I went to finish some shopping for my baby then at 8  I go in l&d there's no room they like I'll call you when we have so we end up going get something to eat an webt back home went an naped but kept waking up by 3am hospilat call says come in at 4 my mom an hubby where awakeiI go an tell them OK get ready
Crazy hospitals! I keep hearing how they send ppl home after they were scheduled a bed

I love hearing people's stories! I'm hoping to go on my own, but my story could end up being similar to yours 2ndtime_mum.  I noticed you've commented on my posts lately, so thanks for your replies! I've been having headaches and nausea, but I actually feel better when I get up and do stuff opposed to taking it easy like my doctor wants me to!

With my daughter I was  sitting on the couch yelling at my son because he was banging on the doors...I stood up and said Marcus come here then BAM! My water broke lol I panicked my son looked at me n starting crying lol then I tryed calming him down n tryed to keep calm. 25mins later I arrived to the hospital I was 6cm

Loved everyone story. With my second baby in Nov 2004 I was shopping at the store with my mom for our Thanksgiving dinner started to have pains and just new we had to get to the hospital three hours later he was ready to come out didn't want it to happen but had a Thanksgiving baby.

@Kjens yes take take it easy mama. Cant wait to hear your birth story. @Momofexpectingsept lol thats funny. That's how I want to go in labor this time lol@day82 you had alot to be thankful for that year lol I loved all you guys stories thank you for sharing!

With my son it was at night I was taking my usual trip to the bathroom every 15mins. It was around 4am I was on the toilet (thank god) then pop my water bag breaks. I sat there in amazement like wow that's a lot of water then quickly got up, rushed to my son's father, woke him up told him what happened. We rushed to the hospital made it There by 6am and at 8:45 my son was being delivered by c-section
@Xcited_mommy2b lol I always feel like my water is going to break on the toilet. Hearing your story is reassuring lbvvs

Haha I love your story! Well I was at my moms house out back sitting with some friends having a casual conversation. (I had my membranes stripped that day) So I'm sitting there and I'm squeezing my lwgs closed because I feel like I'm peeing myself and I'm thinking oh **** I got red basketball shorts on if I don't do something I'm gonna be so embarrassed. So I get up and go to the bathrom and I push thinking to get all the pee out and it srewamed

Out like a pee stream and I freaked out cuz there was all this white stuff in the toilet. So I went and got my mom and she's like omg get ready its time to go. So we get to the hospital and I was 4 cm i had my son at 3:39 the next day. (Sorry accidentally hit post comment)

I had a usual doctors appointment I told them I was having mild cramping but  I suspected it was Braxton hicks so I didn't pay to much attention to it. Afterwards we went to watch courageous the movie I'm sitting there in pain got home I noticed my panties were wet my water had ruptured. So I went in had my baby girl that day :)

@Nikki Lmao that is so funny! Lol ha! Made me tear up laughing lol @Maddy omg I'm praying my water breaks, and I go into natural labor this time. Caught you completely off guard lol. Thanks for sharing ladies! Good luck!

My first son i was having back pain at 11pm my BF calls the hospital n asked them what to do so they tell him to give me some Tylenol n if that doesn't help to come in so i took the Tylenol n took a bath that didn't help so at 7am we went to the hospital n they checked me i was 4cm they said i was having him that day n he was here at 4:49pm. With my second son i was having contractions at 9:30pm soi took a bath went to the hospital at 3am n i was at 6cm had him at 7:15 both times the hospital had to break my wetter cuz it didnt break on its own so idk what it feels like.

With my first son I was in bed getting ready to do the do and right before I could do anything my water breaks in my bed I was so embarrassed I though I had peed on my self so on the way to the hospital we pick up my mom and my sons father was telling my mom how my water broke it was funny but embarrassing lol that was 13 yard ago I wonder how I will go into labor this time around.

@3Babyboyz just like the hospital not to pay attention to the signs of labor, but once you were in everything went pretty fast for you. @ Lol that's funny just imagine it breaking while your doing the due lmao now that would've been super embarrassing lol

question: What were you doing before you went into labor? Funny story lol. With my first pregnancy I was induced, but unaware I was going to be induced. I was 40+5, and was sent to the hospital for fetal monitoring to make sure the baby wasn't distressed or anything. Also, that morning I got a call saying I could come pick up my income tax check lol. So I'm thinking ok I will go to the hospital then go get my check, and go crazy shopping for my little bundle of joy! Well it didn't happen like that. I got to the hospital the nurse hooks me up then takes my blood pressure. I'm sitting there happy go lucky thinking about all the little extra things I'm about to go, and splurge on. So the nurse ask me did you run here? Lol I'm like nooooo my fiance (now my hubby) drove here. She than ask ok do you see spots? Or feel dizzy like your going to faint? I'm like no I feel fine actually I'm going to go pick up my income tax after this and go shopping for my baby girl. I will never forget her next statement! She said, no your not! You just cost yourself a ticket to l&d. My blood pressure was 190/89 or something like that. I'm like wait wait wait!!! Can I go do a little shopping first than come back lol She was like absolutely not! Lol I ended up having preeclampsia, and being induced. When I woke up that day I never thought I'm having my baby today. Took me totally by surprise. How about you ladies?
title: What were you doing!!!????
